name: PaceMaker
0:
”Alexa, open Pace Maker”
”Alexa, ask Pace Maker what is the pace for a 22 minute 5 k?”
”Alexa, ask Pace Maker what is the pace for a 95 minute 10 miler?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pace maker
des: PaceMaker lets you compute the pace speed to complete a race in a given time. You can ask for the pace for a particular time at a particular distance. The required pace will be spoken and displayed on an Echo Show.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
